channel.title: How to move a Object [PI]
channel.description:
Ok, so i go to Data>cfg>Global-objects. But all it has is this...
// objectId X Y H Face objectType //object = 9981 3254 3429 0 -1 10 [ENDOFOBJECTLIST]
And that isnt even planted in the server. where do i find to where to move my altar? Sorry if this is a stupid question :\

item.title: How to move a Object [PI]
item.dc:creator: @xtylerr xtylerr
item.description:
@xtylerr wrote:

Go into

Server>src>server>world>objectmanager.java

and find a line of code that looks something like this:

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(61, 3319, 3507, 1, 10);

now to make your own object, it’s pretty simple.

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(Object Id, X coord, Y coord, 1, 10);

I belive you can change the number 1 to rotate the object, making it -1 1 0 ect. Not sure though.

Read full topic
